title: # 331 - Ben Bailey & ME
description:
Today I sit down with Ben Bailey to talk about Cash Cab, hosting TV, divorce, fighting with strangers, Florida State, and much more!

Check out Ben's short film "BWAM"

www.youtube.com/watch?v=ex8yPf8dwGI 

You can find Ben's Podcast "Tall but True" on iTunes.

This episode is brought to you by UNTUCKit. Get 20% off of your first purchase by using the promo code "Bertcast" at www.untuckit.com 

This episode is also brought to you by Square Space. For a free trial go to www.squarespace.com and use the offer code “Bertcast” and save 10% on your first purchase of a website or domain. 

This episode is also brought to you by Joybird. Get 25% off of your first order by using promo code "Bertcast at www.joybird.com/Bertcast

This episode is also brought to you by Four Sigmatic. Get 15% off of your order using the promo code "Bertcast" or by going to www.foursigmatic.com/bertcast 

Tickets to my “Body Shots” world tour are on sale now!
For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on..

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en
